mapper.select: SELECT bno , TITLE , WRITER , CONTENT , CASE WHEN VIEW_cnt IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE VIEW_CNT END as VIEW_CNT , COMMENT_cnt , REG_DATE , UP_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BNO =#{bno}

SELECT bno , TITLE , WRITER , CONTENT , CASE WHEN VIEW_cnt IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE VIEW_CNT END as VIEW_CNT , COMMENT_CNT , REG_DATE , UP_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE (#{option} = 'A' AND BNO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bno},'%')) OR (#{option} = 'T' AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%'))
SELECT count(bno) AS BNO FROM BOARD
SELECT bno , TITLE , WRITER , VIEW_cnt , COMMENT_cnt , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS REG_DATE , UP_DATE FROM BOARD ORDER BY bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( bno , TITLE , WRITER , content , VIEW_cnt , COMMENT_cnt , REG_DATE , UP_DATE ) SELECT t.bno, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, 0, 0, NOW(), NOW() FROM (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(bno), 0) + 1 AS bno FROM BOARD) AS t
